attributes.action: Change the Council Tax single person discount from 25% to 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present council tax payers living on their own receive a 25% discount.  This should be changed to 50%.  Why should single people subsidise couples when it it so much  more expensive living by oneself having no-one to share all the other household bills with?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
